def count_distinct_strings(N, S):
    MOD = 10 ** 9 - 7
    s = list(map('_ABC'.index, S))
    s0 = s[0]
    dp = [0, 0, 0, 0]
    dp[s0] = 1
    p = 1
    while p < N and s[p] == s0:
        p += 1
    xor = 0 if p % 2 == 0 else s0
    for (i, c) in enumerate(s[p:], start=p):
        (d, e) = (c % 3 + 1, (c + 1) % 3 + 1)
        dp[c] = sum(dp) % MOD
        (dp[d], dp[e]) = (dp[e], dp[d])
        if i == p:
            dp[c] += p // 2
            dp[s[i - 1] ^ c] += (p - 1) // 2
        elif xor == 0:
            dp[c] += 1
        xor ^= c
    return sum(dp) % MOD
